snippet.title: Never Second in Rome
snippet.description:
I have recently announced my next game: Never Second in Rome

It is a turn-based historical game with RPG and management elements. You are a Roman centurion in the army of Julius Caesar. You will control both your character and the unit under his command.

Learn more: https://www.arobertigames.com
Wishlist now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3169580/
